body.name: wisecoco 12.6 Inch Secondary Screen FHD IPS Touch Second Screen Stretched Bar LCD Display 1920X515 Mini HDMI for Laptop Computer Health Speed Windows Aida64 Sub CPU GPU Display
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 12 mins
features: [ FHD IPS Portable Monitor ] wisecoco Portable Monitor is made by AAA+ quality lcd panel. 1920x515 high resolution, 3-5 ms response time, 178°wide viewing angle, 60Hz refresh rate, 1000:1 contrast ratio. Dual inside louder speaker. 12.6 inch DIY stretched bar display. it will offer perfect use feeling when you play games.

[ Multi-touch Capacitive Touch ] Excellent sensitivity capacitive technology and multi-touch capability , Touchscreen drivers with support for 10-finger touch on-screen.when get tap touch press zoom in zoom out or mouse click.it will response within 3-5ms.

[ Widely Compatibility ] Mini HDMI interface design , Easy to connect your laptop, PC, etc. It works perfectly with Windows. it can be used as Aida64 sub second screen CPU GPU monitoring .(Tips：Because our product is just a LCD Monitor, so 1, You need to connect your device through the HDMI port to play videos, images, and more. 2, If you need to use Aida64, please download it yourself.)

[ Easy to use ] Plug and Play Portable，No driver needed.This monitor has four screw holes behind it, the spacing of the screw holes conforms to international standards, making it convenient for you to install this portable display wherever you want.
[ After Sales Service Guarantee ] We will provide you 12 months warranty and great customer service. Should you have any questions please feel free to contact us, we will reply within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stretched Bar LCD Display with casingFHD touchscreen 1920x515 high resolution500cd/㎡ high brightness10-point Touch Capabilities Real IPS technology 178°full viewing angle Plug and Play, Drive-Free, Using as a PC CPU GPU RAM Data Monitor or PC secondary monitor, Aida64 CPU GPU Monitoring.
Secondary Monitor for Computer CPU GPU Data
The touch on this monitor is very precise and responsive. The touch screen supports 10-point touch and pinch to zoom gestures while being precise and sensitive, with a response time 3-5ms.

The Wisecoco Bar LCD monitor has a high resolution of 1920*515, making images and videos smoother and more natural,a resolution of 1920 x 515 is clearer than a resolution of 800 x 400 even the smallest details are displayed clearly.
Regardless of the viewing angle, videos and images can be clearly seen, as it is a true IPS screen, not a TN screen substitute . IPS screen provides a full viewing angle but TN screen not.
It can transform freely between horizontal and vertical modes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Use mine for a floating task screen for work (I wfh)
reviews.reviewText: I have mine set-up on a stand directly in front of my keyboard & I keep a list of my projects, milestones, & next steps needed, so it's all right in front of my face, & that's the only thing I ever put on that screen. For that purpose, it's excellent.. plenty bright, small enough footprint but big enough to be useful, & it looks pretty good too. Doesn't look like a cheap accessory sitting on my desk. I work from home & have 3 large monitors & my notes & details get lost in that much screen real estate.. so adding this for tasks & project notes was a perfect solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money!
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually write reviews but felt the need with this one. Monitor is well worth the price especially with the $10 coupon.Picture: I'm using this as a secondary monitor on my PC, PC monitor being an 55" LG C1 OLED. Using this secondary as a discord/steam solution while a game is full screen. Being that my main is OLED, this monitor obviously doesn't get as deep of blacks but the brightness and color is impressive for the price. Being 1920x515 at 12.6" means the DPI is fairly high so you can get detail on this small screen.Touch: The touch on this monitor is very precise and responsive. I was really impressed with the touch capabilities. I would put it on par with my iPhone 12 Pro Max. One thing you will need to do if using this as a secondary monitor though. The touch will register on your main monitor by default but just run "Calibrate touch screen" in Windows 10. It will allow you to switch which monitor is touch.Setup: The listing says that the monitor needs a 12v2A power supply which isn't necessary. As long as you have a USB port that is capable of passing 2A you should be good to go. I am using a USB 3.1 powered hub and it powers the monitor just fine as well as carrying touch data to the PC. If you enjoy a clean setup I do suggest buying a "180 degree up" micro USB cable as well as a "180 degree up" Mini HDMI to HDMI adapter so the wires wrap cleanly around the monitor.Mounting: Finding a suitable mount isn't easy for such a small monitor. The mount on the monitor is 75mmX75mm. I just purchased one from amazon that folds flat (easy to find) but had to modify it by cutting the mounting plate almost in half. I ended up only using 2 of the 4 mounting holes so the monitor hides all of what's left of the mounting plate. I also had to loosen the pivot points of the mount because it's obviously intended for a heavier monitor. I ended up with a very clean install that sits between my monitor and keyboard.Overall, I am happy with the purchase as this monitor fit exactly what I was going for and worked right away without any downsides. I only wish Wisecoco sold a larger version that is 3840 wide assembled in an enclosure like this one. I would buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't like docking stations, otherwise works great.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small display that I could leave my text messages and notes visible all the time. ipad is too tall and this little display worked perfectly. Functions well with a mac, I just don't use the touch feature as that doesn't work great. It doesn't like to run through my docking station for some reason so I have to run it directly to the computer (Macbook Pro 14" M1 Chip). I tried several docks, cable types, etc. and ended up running a the mini hmdi to usb c back to the computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great secondary display
reviews.reviewText: This stretched out screen makes a great health display monitor. Fits a 1920x515 display image. Works as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Got a dud?
reviews.reviewText: Unit I received was a refurb/return item. Didn't power on and some pieces were missing from the package. Was trying to use this in my Lian Li EVO XL however I couldn't find an optimal place to put it. For mid size/smaller cases I think this suits those better than these larger cases do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best $150 I’ve spent
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this lcd screen. Only thing i’d suggest buying with it is an hdmi to display port adapter depending on your gpu. Super easy to hook up and no software needed :) just plug up the hdmi to your gpu and the touch cable to a usb port on your motherboard and you’re all set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Spotify monitor
reviews.reviewText: Have this little touch screen hooked up under my main monitor on a little stand and an angled mini HDMI and usb adapter. Perfect for having Spotify or other apps visible but out of the way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little panel
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was really looking for something that would take my new build over the top. This does it nicely and then some. Really makes everything look so much better. I have attached a video, if you are on the fence, don't be; it is worth the cost of admission.Extremely easy to install, but be aware that you will need a mini HDMI to either HDMI or DisplayPort (depending on your use case). There will also be a need to run a MicroUSB out to power the panel. The panel even has a speaker, it is sharp and bright enough to see through the tinted window of my case (see video).All in all, I am beyond happy with this purchase, I dit NOT dream that it would come out this amazing. Simply love it!
